interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Replacement Toothbrush Heads Compatible With Oral B Braun Electric Toothbrush, 4 Count
Review Date: 2019/07/17
Store: HDY
Average Rating: 4.4
Product Details: {'Brand': 'HDY', 'Size': '4 Count (Pack of 1)', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Item Firmness Description': 'Extra Soft', 'Number of Pieces': '4', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '0.43 x 0.39 x 2.76 inches; 0.81 Ounces', 'UPC': '632088377561', 'Manufacturer': 'HDY'}
Review Text: These are a solid generic replacement for our Oral-B brush heads.  They fit every toothbrush in the house without issue and work well.  They are a bit more angular than the name brand and I can tell, but my wife and kids didn't notice.  My kids love the smiley face on the back of the brush head.  A solid generic replacement.
Review Title: Good generic brush heads
Rating: 4.0
--------------------------------------------------

profile:
**User Summary:**

- **Preference for Generic Products:** The user shows a clear preference for affordable, generic alternatives over name-brand items, valuing functionality and compatibility.
  
- **Family-Oriented:** The user considers the needs of family members (wife and kids) in product choices, indicating a focus on household suitability and usability.

- **Functionality Over Brand Loyalty:** The user prioritizes practical features, such as fitting multiple toothbrushes and overall effectiveness, rather than brand loyalty.

- **Attention to Detail:** The user notes specifics about product design (angular shape) but indicates flexibility, as not all family members notice these details, showing a pragmatic approach.

- **Family Engagement:** The mention of kids enjoying a fun feature (smiley face) suggests that the user values products that make hygiene enjoyable for children, indicating a preference for engaging and kid-friendly products.

- **Positive Rating:** The user gives a relatively high average rating (4.0), suggesting satisfaction with the purchased products and a tendency to choose reliable alternatives.

Overall, the user favors practical, family-friendly, and affordable solutions that maintain quality while meeting diverse household needs.
